channel.title: Can someone help fast ! DC when selling items to any shop!
channel.description: basically, when i sell and item to a shop say general store or i buy anything guy, the person who sells the item sells it but dc's as well... all the time. I'd greatly appreciate it if someone could help me out!! thanks so much :D and i just dl'd this source, it's TrisidiaX
